SELECT count(distinct p.prop_id) count FROM tz_prod_prop p
LEFT JOIN tz_prod_prop_lang ppl ON p.prop_id = ppl.prop_id
WHERE p.rule = #{prodProp.rule} and p.shop_id = #{prodProp.shopId}
and trim(replace(ppl.prop_name,' ','')) like trim(replace(concat('%',#{prodProp.propName},'%'),' ',''))
